entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
